title: UI frozen or buttons not working. Am I just lagging?
body:
OK, I tried buying an item from the shop in a match and it just decided to get stuck on one item.

even though I had money to BUY the item, it wouldn't let me do anything at all. It wouldn't even let me upgrade the skills when I level up. All I could do is try playing through the match stuck with skill points I couldn't use and no ult. I couldn't even build up my character because of how the frozen the shop was being.

replies.body:
So you're able to move around normally and see everything else moving, but the shop won't let you buy items and you can't level up your skills? If this is the case, it sounds like there might be some game files that became corrupted somehow. Try running our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with Force Repatch turned on.

Let me know how it works for you!

[Here](http://i.imgur.com/kdoK5Lt.png) is the result of my attempt to use your repair tool. I have tried this 3 times.

I appreciate your help! I would like to apologize if I came across as rude or angry during the initial post. Frustration intensified when it should not have at the time I made that post. Thank you for your help Broporo.

No worries! We've all encountered that frustration of just wanting to play a game and not being able to. I'm just happy to help ^_^!

That chromium error you're seeing could be caused by something interfering with the repair tool. Try closing out all other programs, then run the tool from the default install location (should be C:\Program Files (x86)\Hextech Repair Tool). That should get the repair tool running!
Nothing changed. Even when I made sure the file explorer was closed when I hit start just to be extra sure.

Even though you closed out the file explorer, there could still be a number of processes running in the background. 

I'd like to double check that everything else is closed when you run the repair tool. If I could have you follow the steps in our [**Clean Boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq7) guide, then try to run the repair tool.

Let me know if you're able to get it running with everything else turned off.
Looks like everything is good to go. Thanks for all your help Broporo! =D
